name: kill-mcp
title: Kill MCP Servers
description: View and manage MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers running on your Mac. See RAM usage and kill processes.
author: baptiste-jn

commands.name: index
commands.title: List MCP Servers
commands.description: View all running MCP servers with their RAM usage

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
